TopicTitle: can someone help me find the sstv broadcast?

Articles.Content: i know its on its lower pole, but i can only find one measly video of it, which would help, but its at night, so i cant use relative positioning. can someone pose a pic or something of it (in the map)? thanks

I haven't the foggiest idea as to what you're referring to, but try mapping the planet with the ISA MapSat mod. Enable anomalies display and you should be able to get an idea of where something is (a very good idea, I dare say).

1) Send a rover with an ISAmap antenna.

2) Put it in a polar orbit around Duna.

3) Do a full scan.

4) Pick a landing spot and land

5) Enjoy.
